title: Harley & Me: Love Means Never Saying Goodbye
description: Have you ever had a love so profound it altered your life? Such is the love of Mari and Harley. He was her everything. She was his reason for being. He fell deeply in love the moment he first laid eyes on her. Memories of a sweet love. How do you know when you have found the love of your life?
author: Cassandra   Parker
